mapper.select: SELECT rfq_or_tender_form_code FROM c_srm_enquiry_invitation_for_bids_t_h ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

select `status`, `quotation_start_time`,quotation_stop_time, bid_opening_place,bid_opening_time,update_explain from c_srm_enquiry_invitation_for_bids_t_h
rfq_or_tender_form_code like concat('%',#{rfqOrTenderFormCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and is_delete=0
order by create_time desc

select examine_number from c_srm_enquiry_invitation_for_bids_t_h
rfq_or_tender_form_code=#{rfqOrTenderFormCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and is_delete=0
order by create_time desc
